description: System-generated unique identifier for this inspection item record.
Date and time the inspection result was recorded or last updated, with sub-second precision.
Optional free-text remarks about the inspection entry.
Optional note specific to the checklist item’s observation or context during the inspection.
Identifier of the checklist item evaluated during the inspection; links to the inspection item catalog.
Name of the reference table for the checklist item identifier in a generic/polymorphic foreign key design; confirm with SME.
Foreign key to the related work order detail line this inspection item belongs to.
Name of the table referenced by the related work order detail ID in a polymorphic reference; confirm with SME.
Outcome of the item’s check indicating success, failure, or similar status.
Original identifier from the legacy source system for this record, retained for migration mapping and traceability.
Name of the originating legacy table for this record, kept for data lineage and migration reference.
